item.title: Looks like java bots are over
item.dc:creator: @superstuntguy superstuntguy
item.description:
@superstuntguy wrote:

heres my guess at runescript code:

[questinfo]
[id]34[/id]
[name]Some quest name ish thing[/name]
[requirements]
[combat]30[/combat]
...
[/requirements]
[/questinfo]
[start]
[actionid]847[/actionid]
...

Etc.
I imagine its a simple easily interpreted script, kinda like xml.

Read full topic
item.source: Looks like java bots are over

item.title: Looks like java bots are over
item.dc:creator: @googlethis googlethis
item.description:
@googlethis wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:1, topic:15317”][quote author=rabcarl link=topic=22602.msg255960#msg255960 date=1158641439]
So does that mean that next week, UBI, I-bot and ARGA will all be gone? LOL!!!
I find this funny because no matter how much updating goes on SCAR will live on. SCAR OWNZ!!!
[/quote]
scar is shit, hence the name
runescript is their stuff to process all the configurations of the server, its still obviously coded in java (maybe in c++, i doubt its even in java cause it would be slow) like in a screenshot they had some (male, female) thing sticking out.[/quote]
Yet all of the private servers are in Java…Methinks you are spreading red herrings.

Read full topic
item.source: Looks like java bots are over

You’re jumping to conclusions, they are updating this “RuneScript”… Which means it’s already been in use.

Keep dreaming.[/quote]

no its still java its just how they add content like dialouge and such
